name: dynfetcher
description: Simple class for fetching parts of web pages using CSS selectors.

scripts.test-cov: npm run-script clean && mkdir lib-cov _compiled && coffee -c -o _compiled/ lib && jscoverage _compiled/ lib-cov/ && DYNFETHCER_COV=1 node_modules/.bin/mocha --reporter html-cov > test/coverage.html
